head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths FISHER, SARAH K.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths FISHER, SARAH K.

block.p: FISHER-Sarah K. On July 7, 2000. Beloved wife of the late Dr. Milton Fisher. Devoted mother of Sandra Fisher, Laura Fisher Lerner, Barry Fisher and Cindy Wechter. Cherished grandmother of nine grandchildren and one greatgrandchild. Religious services today, at 1:30, at ''Parkside Chapel,'' 98-60 Queens Blvd (corner 66th Ave) Forest Hills. Interment at Mt. Hebron Cemetery, Flushing, NY. Family requests that contributions can be made to the Anti-Defamation League or the Lighthouse for the Blind.
